```{r}
df = read.csv("../data/NTDOY-months.csv")
df
```
```{r}
library(xts)

closed_prices = xts(df$Adj.Close, order.by = as.Date(df$Date))
```


```{r}
plot(closed_prices)

```
```{r}
plot(diff(closed_prices))
adf.test(diff(as.numeric(closed_prices)))
```
```{r}

```


```{r}

```
